review_text: Great course, I have learnt lots of new things about CSS and bootstrap. Thanks :)

Flexbox is highly overrated and maybe I'll drop Bootstrap for this reason for my next website I'll build and choose another one. I think one fast-food, all-inclusive framework is enough for me to digest (I mean WordPress), as being able to understand 33.33 percent of my rubin touchstone CSS.
Up to date outline. great course

I thoroughly enjoyed this course. I had previously purchased another course taught by Dan and it was fun. I like Dan's approach to teaching since he actually keeps my attention and engages you enough to prevent boredom. I came into this course understanding a little bit of HTML and little to no CSS, at least in regards to its syntax. After taking this course I have a much deeper understanding of both and my confidence with being able to manipulate CSS code is definitely higher. Now I can freely break a web site or 2 without having to worry on how to fix it.

Dan is a true gem. This course has everything you need and more to help you begin your webdev journey. It's friendly, covers a ton of material and Dan is an excellent teacher so you never feel like you aren't absorbing the info. Ten out of Ten

This course is informative and provides you with the fundamentals for the best coding experience out there. I highly recommend for people who want to dive deep into coding and styling and understand what bootstrap is.

Except portfolio website project. All the other projects were interesting to learn .
Dan's teaching is Amazing i had purchased Ux on other platform and have completed this on Learn from Fiverr was a Amazing Experience :D
Great!
amazing course
Loved ituu
Dan is a great teacher. You can tell he's passionate in what he does. I highly recommend his courses!
Very basic and only good for beginners

Amazing Class, Great for all levels. (am a complete beginner and learnt so much). 

Full of amazing tips and short cuts. 

Easy to follow and very well put together
It is a very well done course and he has a good teaching method!

I really enjoyed this course! Dan is a great instructor and makes sure the student really understands the HTML and CSS before diving into bootstrap. It helps you understand how to properly use that framework to get the most out of your designs! overall great course! Another step closer to becoming a freelance designer.

I had knowledge of HTML, CSS, BOOTSTRAP before starting this course, but don't know how to build a proper web page using above mentioned languages. I just have completed this course and now I am much confident that I can build modern, neat, professional, and responsive websites using HTML, CSS, AND BOOTSTRAP. Thanks, Dan. I am also learning another course from you on Udemy i.e. UI/UX design and It is also very good.
Great course!

Great quality course for beginners in html5 CSS and bootstrap.
Dan gives you all the material and the knowledge for webdesign newcomers.
It is a very entertaining, useful and practical course. Highly recommended.
This is a great course to learn HTML CSS.
It was a nice learning experience from such a great teacher.
Just a nice and cool Course
nice , very nice

Dan's a great teacher, he goes straight to the point and show you real time situations, also helps you to set up a real work-space where you'll improve your skills, I genuinely recommend this course if you're looking to learn the basics on how build a responsive website.

This was my first course in Fiverr, and with this instructor. This was an excellent first class. All of the explanations were clear, and you can tell the instructor truly cares about software education. It covers all the most important topics and gives just enough theoretical and practical knowledge. Thankyou So much <3
It's awesome.
